# unicorn/no-useless-undefined <Badge type="info" text="Pedantic" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="fix" type="info">
<span class="emoji">üõ†Ô∏è</span> An auto-fix is available for this rule.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Do not use useless `undefined`.

### Why is this bad?

`undefined` is the default value for new variables, parameters, return statements, etc‚Ä¶ so specifying it doesn't make any difference.

### Examples

Examples of **incorrect** code for this rule:

```javascript
let foo = undefined;
```

Examples of **correct** code for this rule:

```javascript
let foo;
```
